improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error. The variable x becomes 0 after the loop, leading to a division by zero error in line 7.
The loop iterates 10 times, decrementing x each time.  At the end, x will be 0.  This could be improved by adding a check to prevent division by zero.
Add input validation to ensure x is not 0 before performing division. For example: if (x != 0) { y = 1 / x; } else { handle_error(); }
